title: Roger Michelot
text:
Roger Michelot (8 June 1912 in Saint-Dizier, Haute-Marne – 19 March 1993) was a French boxer who competed at the <a href="1932%20Summer%20Olympics">1932 Summer Olympics</a> and the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936 Summer Olympics</a>. In 1936 he won the gold medal in the light heavyweight class after winning the final against Richard Vogt. Born in Saint-Dizier, Haute-Marne he also competed at the 1932 Summer Olympics.
